Package cycling

Class Result

  • java.lang.Object
    • cycling.Result
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable
    public class Result
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable
    Result encapsulates rider results per stage, and handles time adjustments and rankings (scoring is done externally based on points distributions defined in Cycling Portal)
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

        public static java.util.ArrayList<Result> allResults

    • Constructor Detail

      • Result

        public Result​(int sId,
              int rId,
              java.time.LocalTime... check)
        Result constructor; creates a new result entry and adds to the allResults array.
        Parameters:
        sId - The ID of the stage the result refers to
        rId - The ID of the rider who achieved the result
        check - An array of times at which the rider reached each checkpoint (including start and finish)

    • Method Detail

        Returns:

        Parameters:

        Returns:

      • getResult

        public static Result getResult​(int sId,
                               int rId)
                        throws IDNotRecognisedException
        Parameters:
        sId - The ID of the stage of the result instance
        rId - The ID of the associated rider to the result instance
        Returns:
        The Result instance
        Throws:
        IDNotRecognisedException - If an instance for the rider/stage combination is not found in the allResults array

        rId - The ID of the associated rider to the result instance to remove
        Throws:

        b - End time
        Returns:

      • adjustedCheckpoints

        public java.time.LocalTime[] adjustedCheckpoints()
        Returns:
        An array of the checkpoint times, adjusted to a threshold of one second

        Parameters:

        Returns:
        The adjusted time for checkpoint n
